Documentation#

NNRepair#

class nnreplayer.repair.NNRepair(model_orig, model_type='tensorflow')#

NN Repair class helps in initializing, compiling ang running the repair process.

compile(x_repair: numpy.ndarray[typing.Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]], y_repair: numpy.ndarray[typing.Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]], layer_2_repair: int, output_constraint_list: typing.Optional[typing.List[typing.Type[nnreplayer.utils.utils.ConstraintsClass]]] = None, cost: typing.Callable = <function give_mse_error>, cost_weights: numpy.ndarray[typing.Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]] = array([1., 1.]), max_weight_bound: typing.Union[int, float] = 1.0, data_precision: int = 4, param_precision: int = 4) → None#

Compile the optimization model and setup the repair optimizer

Parameters

  • x_repair – Input repair samples

  • y_repair – Output repair samples

  • layer_2_repair – Target repair layer

  • output_constraint_list – List of output constraints Defaults to None.

  • cost – Minimization loss function. Defaults to give_mse_error.

  • cost_weights – cost_weights[0] corresponds to weight of min loss, cost_weights[1] corresponds to weight of weight bounding slack variable. Defaults to np.array([1.0, 1.0]).

  • max_weight_bound – Upper bound of weights errorDefaults to 1.0.

  • data_precision – precision of rounding to decimal place for dataDefaults to 4.

  • param_precision – precision of rounding to decimal place for parameters. Defaults to 4.

extract_network_layers_values(x_dataset: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]]) → List[numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]]]#

Extract the values of each layer for all input samples

Parameters

x_dataset – network input samples

Returns

values of layers give input samples

repair(options: Type[nnreplayer.utils.options.Options]) → Any#

Perform the layer-wise repair and update the weights of model_mlp

Parameters

options – optimization options

Returns

Repaired Model.

reset()#

Reset the model_mlp model to the original model

summary(direc: Optional[str] = None)#

Print and/or store the pyomo optimization model

Parameters

direc – directory to print (stdout) the modelled opt. Defaults to None.

Raises

ValueError – Raises an error if opt is not complied

class nnreplayer.utils.ConstraintsClass(constraint_type: str, A: Union[List[numpy.ndarray], numpy.ndarray], B: Union[List[numpy.ndarray], numpy.ndarray])#

Defining the Output Error:#

nnreplayer.utils.give_mse_error(data1: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]], data2: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]])#

return the mean square error of data1-data2 samples

Parameters

  • data1 (ndarray) – predicted targets

  • data2 (ndarray) – original targets

Returns

mse error

Return type

float
